plans.name: Basic Plan
plans.desc: Basic access to the API, limits access to 100 calls per hour.

plans.name: Unlimited Plan
plans.desc: Unlimited access to the API, no limits in terms of calls.

plans.name: Godlike Plan
plans.desc: Not only gives you unlimited access to the API, but you may also destroy it at your wish.
